items.title: On this date, Zebulon Pike started his expedition to explore the southwestern U…
items.content_html: On this date, Zebulon Pike started his expedition to explore the southwestern U. S. He spotted a mountain now named for him, Pikes Peak. Though he did not summit, you can now drive to the top. Read more in our historical newspaper archives. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn8304546… #ChronAm #otd
items.summary: On this date, Zebulon Pike started his expedition to explore the southwestern U. S. He spotted a mountain now named for him, Pikes Peak. items.title: On this date in 1789, the people of France stormed the Bastille, a fortress and…
items.content_html:
On this date in 1789, the people of France stormed the Bastille, a fortress and prison. Bastille Day, or La Fête Nationale, was a turning point in the French Revolution. Read more in our historical newspaper archives.
chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn8201548… #ChronAm #otd
